pr_title: Fix gcsFS copyToLocal to precreate local destination directory

timeline.message: Fix gcsFS copyToLocal to precreate local destination directory

timeline.bodyText: should we check the existence before creating? will forceMkdir throw an exception if the directory exists?
timeline.author: kishoreg

replies.bodyText: No. This util is idempotent. Doesn't throw any exception even if directory exists.
replies.author: laxmanchekka
